title: Meaning of derivative with population of insects

content.description:
The number of insects in a certain population at time t days is modeled by the function P with first derivative <math> <semantics> <mrow> <msup> <mi>P</mi> <mo>'</mo> </msup> <mo>(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>)</mo> <mo>=</mo> <mn>0.3</mn> <msup> <mi>t</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>+</mo> <mn>12</mn> <mi>t</mi> <mo>+</mo> <mn>210</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWGqbGaai4ja8aadaqadaqaa8qacaWG0baapaGaayjkaiaawMca a8qacaqGGaGaeyypa0JaaeiiaiaaicdacaGGUaGaaG4maiaadshapa WaaWbaaSqabeaapeGaaGOmaaaakiabgUcaRiaabccacaaIXaGaaGOm aiaadshacaqGGaGaey4kaSIaaeiiaiaaikdacaaIXaGaaGimaaaa@4924@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>. At time <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>t</mi> <mtext> </mtext> <mo>=</mo> <mtext> </mtext> <mn>0</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWG0bGaaeiiaiabg2da9iaabccacaaIWaaaaa@3A15@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>, the number of insects in the population is 40.

I. At time <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>t</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mtext> </mtext> <mn>10</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWG0bGaeyypa0JaaeiiaiaaigdacaaIWaaaaa@3A2D@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>, the number of insects in the population is 2840.

II. At time <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>10</mn></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWG0bGaeyypa0JaaeiiaiaaigdacaaIWaaaaa@3A2D@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>, the number of insects in the population is increasing at a rate of 360 insects per day.

III. At time <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>10</mn></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWG0bGaeyypa0JaaeiiaiaaigdacaaIWaaaaa@3A2D@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>, the rate of change of the number of insects in the population is increasing at a rate of 18 insects per day per day.
content.question: Which of the following statements are true?

topic.text: 4.1: Interpreting the Meaning of the Derivative in Context

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
